Proper Form: One hand on ball; push up; roll ball to other hand.
Sit, feet off floor; rotate ball side-to-side.
Reach overhead; slam ball down using core/arms.

Description: Lower body strength with rotational stability.
Proper Form: Lunge forward; twist ball over front leg.
Lie face down; hold ball; lift arms and legs.
Back-to-back; pass ball side-to-side in circle.
Both hands on ball; elbows tucked; lower chest.
Shoulders on bench; ball on hips; drive up.
Hinge on one leg; lower ball; keep back flat.
Hinge hips back; lower ball to mid-shins.
Lie on back; ball on hips; lift hips to ceiling.
Squat; explosively throw ball to wall target.
Push ball from chest explosively to partner.

Description: Combines upper and lower ab activation.
Proper Form: Ball between feet; crunch knees and chest.
Sit-up while keeping ball locked out overhead.
Step back into lunge; drive through front heel.
Step forward; hold ball at chest; squat.

Description: Weighted move for glutes and stability.
Proper Form: Step foot behind and across; hold ball at chest.
Lie on BOSU; hold ball overhead; crunch up.

Description: Lateral movement for quads and obliques.
Proper Form: Step wide to side; sit into hip; hold ball.
One-leg bridge; squeeze ball between knees.
Hold ball overhead; step forward into lunge.
Sit up; toss ball; catch on way down.
Hold ball at chest; squat deep; core tight.
Toss ball during "up" phase of sit-up.
Pass ball to partner while twisting side-to-side.
Squat; explosively throw; catch and descend.
Push-up; roll ball to partner; they push-up.
